Class L3HostDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • L3HostDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, L3Listener

    public class L3HostDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, L3Listener
    This class displays a GUI from which you can send and receive Layer 3 frames.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      L3HostDisplay(L3Host host)
      Display 3 fields: a display field for putting status messages in and displaying the values in received packets; a DestAddr field, into which the user can type a destination address in the form x.y; a payload field into which the user types a character string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Called when the user hits enter in the GUI field, indicating that a L3 Packet should be created and sent.
      void packetReceived(L3Handler iface, L3Packet pkt)
      Called when a frame is received in the handler from the layer below it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • L3HostDisplay

        public L3HostDisplay(L3Host host)
        Display 3 fields: a display field for putting status messages in and displaying the values in received packets; a DestAddr field, into which the user can type a destination address in the form x.y; a payload field into which the user types a character string. The title of the frame display's this endpoint's L3Address.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Called when the user hits enter in the GUI field, indicating that a L3 Packet should be created and sent.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • packetReceived

        public void packetReceived(L3Handler iface,
                           L3Packet pkt)
        Called when a frame is received in the handler from the layer below it. This function prints out info about the received frame in the displayField (where the packet came from and what payload it is carrying.
        Specified by:
        packetReceived in interface L3Listener
